entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:08 a.m. EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming east 20 gusting to 40 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Blizzard. High zero.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 80. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
